summary: The module defines a registry that orchestrates multiple security analysis runners, executes them (including parallel execution), merges and enriches their reports, applies filtering and exitâ€‘code thresholds, and manages the final presentation and storage of the consolidated results in various output formats.
business_intent: To provide a single entry point that runs diverse security scanners, combines their findings, enforces policy thresholds, and delivers unified compliance reports for integration into CI/CD pipelines and governance workflows.
